name: PSA Antwerp
goal:
PSA Antwerp is een Container Terminal Operator en is onderdeel van de PSA International group.
In de EU heeft de group vestigingen in Portugal (Sines), Italie (Genoa en Venice) en Belgie (Antwerpen en Zeebrugge)
interests: Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Port Policy Regulation
GBER
UCC
EU initiative: Screening of foreign investment
TEN-T
